casebody.data:
James S. COHEN, AS TRUSTEE OF the ROBERT B. COHEN LIVING TRUST, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
Samantha O. PERELMAN, Defendant. In the Matter of the Estate of Robert B. Cohen, Deceased. James S. Cohen, as Trustee of the Robert B. Cohen Living Trust, Plaintiff,
v.
Samantha O. Perelman, Defendant. In the Matter of the Estate of Robert B. Cohen, Deceased. M-1096/1097/1098 September Term 2018
082233 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 21, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-1096) and to file an over-length brief in support of the motion for reconsideration (M-1097) are granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-1098) is denied.
